statements: SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM SatellitePerformance;
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metrics FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, maintenance_logs FROM SatellitePerformance;
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE satellite_name LIKE 'Satellite%';
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE performance_metrics->>'battery_status' = 'OK';
SELECT id, satellite_name, launch_date, JSON_LENGTH(performance_metrics) AS metrics_count FROM SatellitePerformance ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM satellite_performance;
SELECT satellite_id, performance_metric FROM satellite_performance ORDER BY performance_value DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_history WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_id, performance_metric, performance_value FROM satellite_performance WHERE performance_value > 0.5;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_performance WHERE performance_metric = 'signal_strength';
SELECT performance_metric, performance_value FROM satellite_performance WHERE satellite_id = 2 ORDER BY performance_value DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, MAX(performance_value) AS max_performance_value FROM satellite_performance GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_events FROM maintenance_history;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_performance;
SELECT satellite_id, performance_data FROM satellite_performance ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM satellite_metadata WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_performance WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, performance_data->>'temperature' as temperature FROM satellite_performance WHERE performance_data->>'temperature' >= '30';
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, status FROM satellite_metadata WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT m.satellite_id, m.maintenance_type, r.maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records m LEFT JOIN maintenance_records r ON m.satellite_id = r.satellite_id AND m.maintenance_date < r.maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM satellite_performance WHERE satellite_id IN (SELECT satellite_id FROM satellite_metadata WHERE status = 'Active');
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance;
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metric, metric_value FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, orbit_type FROM SatelliteInformation WHERE manufacturer = 'SpaceX';
SELECT satellite_id, sensor_type, sensor_value, reading_time FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE performance_metric = 'Temperature' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metric, metric_value FROM SatellitePerformance WHERE measurement_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT satellite_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM SatelliteInformation NATURAL JOIN SensorData WHERE manufacturer = 'SpaceX';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Check' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, measurement_date, performance_metric FROM SatellitePerformance JOIN SatelliteInformation ON SatellitePerformance.satellite_name = SatelliteInformation.satellite_name;
SELECT * FROM satellite_instruments;
SELECT satellite_id, instrument_name, status FROM satellite_instruments WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT satellite_id, launch_date, instrument_name FROM satellite_instruments ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT calibration_id, calibration_date, calibration_type FROM calibration_records WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND satellite_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM satellite_instruments;
SELECT satellite_id, instrument_name, launch_date FROM satellite_instruments ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, instrument_name, status FROM satellite_instruments WHERE status='Active';
SELECT satellite_id, orbit_type, altitude FROM satellite_orbits WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT satellite_id, maintenance_type, technician_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
